mdRecord.dcterms:title: Washington Society: You are respectfully invited to attend the valedictory oration of the Washington Society of the University of Virginia : to be delivered in the Public Hall on Monday the 27th, inst. at 8 o'clock P.M. / Orator, Henry A. Carrington of Charlotte Co., Virginia
You are respectfully invited to attend the valedictory oration of the Washington Society of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Carrington, Henry A.
University of Virginia. Washington Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 16 x 22 cm. folded to 16 x 11 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text (within embossed ornamental border) on p. [1] only; p. [2]-[4] blank.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Transferred from UVa Chronological File, 2000. Ms. notes in pencil on p.[2]-[4] about Henry VIII and his wives.
